requirements.name: How many multiples
requirements.requirement: Count correct multiples of factor between start and end (inclusive).

requirements.name: Raise to a power
requirements.requirement: Correct result for raising root to exponent.
requirements.inverse: Incorrect result for raising to a power.

requirements.name: Consumable
requirements.requirement: Correct number of cycles before on-hand amount is empty.
requirements.inverse: Incorrect number of cycles before on-hand amount is empty.

requirements.name: Prime number
requirements.requirement: Correct determination if the number is prime.

requirements.name: Build a string
requirements.requirement: Correct construction of the string made up of starter and the next number of characters (in order).

requirements.name: Multiples of a factor
requirements.requirement: Correct construction of a string with the first qty multiples of factor.
requirements.inverse: Incorrect string construction for multiples of a factor.

requirements.name: Sum of values
requirements.requirement: Correct sum of all values between start and end (inclusive).
